title: Crimes of Passion (1984)
description:
Original Title: Crimes of Passion (1984)
1 h 42 min
Drama | Thriller


***********************************************************************************

Joanna Crane lives a double life. During the day she works as fashion designer but during the night she becomes a fifty-dollar hooker named China Blue. As she is accused for industrial spying, Bobby Grady is hired to shadow her, but they end up falling in love. Meanwhile, a psychopathic preacher is determined to save her from this life of sin and starts stalking her.
